languages.text: {n}Застенчиво потупив взгляд, Авель некоторое время молчит, а затем мягко произносит:{/n} "Мы принесли великие жертвы".
{n}Abel lowers his eyes and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."
languages.original_text: {n}Застенчиво потупив взгляд, Авель некоторое время молчит, а затем мягко произносит:{/n} "Мы принесли великие жертвы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel lowers his eyes bashfully and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}アベルは視線を落としてしばらく黙り込んだ後、口を開く。{/n}「私たちは多大な犠牲を払ってきた」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel lowers his eyes and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルは視線を落としてしばらく黙り込んだ後、口を開く。{/n}「私たちは多大な犠牲を払ってきた」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯垂下目光，沉默了一会儿，之后开了口。{/n}“我们已经付出了巨大的牺牲。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel lowers his eyes and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯垂下目光，沉默了一会儿，之后开了口。{/n}“我们已经付出了巨大的牺牲。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel baisse les yeux et met un certain temps à répondre.{/n} « Nous avons fait de grands sacrifices. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel lowers his eyes and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel baisse les yeux et met un certain temps à répondre.{/n} « Nous avons fait de grands sacrifices. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel baja la mirada y se queda en silencio por un tiempo. A continuación, dice:{/n} «Hemos realizado grandes sacrificios».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel lowers his eyes and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel baja la mirada y se queda en silencio por un tiempo. A continuación, dice:{/n} «Hemos realizado grandes sacrificios».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel senkt den Blick, schweigt eine Weile und sagt dann:{/n} "Wir haben große Opfer erbracht."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel lowers his eyes and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel senkt den Blick, schweigt eine Weile und sagt dann:{/n} "Wir haben große Opfer erbracht."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel; gözlerini indirip bir süre sessiz kalıyor, ardından konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Büyük fedakârlıklarda bulunduk."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel lowers his eyes and is silent for a while, then says,{/n} "We have made great sacrifices."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel gözlerini indiriyor ve bir süre sessiz kalıyor, ardından konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Büyük fedakârlıklarda bulunduk."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
